Title: Craftily crossing the Jinsha River, forcefully crossing the Dadu River
Notes: The poster shows the crossings of the Jinsha and Dadu rivers, represented by iconic oil paintings of the events. Photographs of clothing, shoes and other paraphernalia worn or used by soldiers during the crossing of the Snowy Mountains (Jiajinshan). The crossing itself is represented by a cartoon and an oil painting by Ai Zhongxin.
